detail_desc: Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with an extra high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Loafers in soft imitation suede with a bow on the top. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and close-fitting cuffs.
Warm-lined hi-tops in glittery imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a wide neckline, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in soft, block-coloured sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. One pair in a solid colour and one pair with an all-over print and appliqués on the knees.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, front and back pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit.

Jacket in sturdy cotton twill with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a collar with a tab and button. Flap patch front pockets with a concealed press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and concealed press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in premium cotton with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a deep V-neck front and back with a horizontal, contrasting colour grosgrain strap at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, short, flounced sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Metal ball chain necklace with a glittery plastic pendant in the shape of a flying unicorn. Length of necklace 45 cm. .
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a contrasting colour press-stud placket and ribbing.
Knee-length, A-line dress in sturdy slub jersey made from a cotton blend with a square neckline and elastication around the top. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the hems. Unlined.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle and button stud fasteners. Width approx. 2.5 cm.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in airy, crinkled viscose with a wide neckline, narrow elastication at the top and inset lace trims at the front. Wide sleeves and smocking and a frill at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Fully lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts. Detachable ties at the back of the neck, ties at the back, side support and a silicone trim at the top.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake welt back pockets and slim legs.
Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Calf-length, halterneck dress in softly draping satin with wide ties that fasten at the back of the neck and elastication at the back. Gathered seam with a flared, asymmetric flounce to the hem. Lined at the top.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in soft twill with elastication at the back of the waist. Loose fit with a fake fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in a soft, fine knit with lace shoulder sections and short lace sleeves with scalloped trims.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder crop top in ribbed jersey containing glittery threads. Slight V-neck at the front with a knot detail.
Cardigan in a fine rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and open front pockets.
Short, fitted dress in a fine-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, short sleeves and scalloped cuffs and hem with hole embroidery. Unlined.
Long, wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and slits at the hem.
A pair of hoop earrings in metal.

Lightly padded jacket in nylon with appliqués, with sleeves and a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. Ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, side pockets with press-studs and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Satin top with embroidery at the top and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Oversized shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a large chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.
Fitted top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a deep, lace-trimmed V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Waterproof boots with boot lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Warm fur faux linings and insoles, and chunky, patterned soles.
Short, two-strand shiny metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 36-44 cm.
Zip-through hoodie in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button, long sleeves and scalloped edges.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist, frills at the top and medium coverage at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Trousers in pattern-weave fabric with a regular waist, zip fly, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide legs with creases.
Fitted sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and twisted seams. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Glittery shoulder bag with a metal decoration on the front, flap with a hook and loop fastening, and shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 4x9x13.5 cm.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbing at the cuffs.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with lace down the front, elastication and a drawstring at the top and short sleeves.
Sports top in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined hood with a collar and elasticated drawstring. Discreet kangaroo pocket and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Jumper in a soft, chunky rib knit with dropped shoulders and pattern-knit sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length V-neck dress in woven fabric with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a seam under the bust, concealed zip in one side and a flared, pleated skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined at the top.
Fine-knit wool hat with a pompom on the top.
Waist belt in imitation leather with two metal buckles. Width approx. 2 cm.
Long metal earrings with plastic sparkly stone pendants. Length 12.5 cm.
Set in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless top in satin with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a draped neckline and a double-layered top.
Sports vest top in ribbed fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Boxy-style hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with a slit and narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif on the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in corduroy made from a cotton and modal blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Coat in a felted wool blend with notch lapels, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, large patch front pockets, high slits in the sides and a box pleat at the back. Unlined.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hi-tops with lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Maxi dress in an airy, textured weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a gathered seam under the bust and a seam at the hem of the skirt for added width. Lined at the top.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with an angular neckline and short sleeves.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Knee-length running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Ventilating mesh at the crotch, and zipped side pockets. Jersey inner shorts.
Headband knitted in soft cashmere with a wrapover front.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.
Short, A-line skirt in washed denim with a raw-edge hem.
Fitted tops in soft jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
